snippet: Wholesalers increased stockpiles 0.6 percent in January from December, the Commerce Department said on Tuesday.
abstract: Commerce Department says that wholesale businesses increased stockpiles 0.6 percent in January 2014 from December 2013, despite suffering steepest sales drop in nearly five years; change suggests that companies expect economy to rebound after abrupt winter slowdown.
lead_paragraph: Wholesalers increased stockpiles 0.6 percent in January from December, the Commerce Department said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Wholesalers Increase Stockpiles Despite Sales Drop
headline.print_headline: Wholesalers Increase Stockpiles Despite Sales Drop
